ing: 1 (16 ounce) package dried lima beans, soaked overnight
n: BDukes Lima Beans, Cabbage and Smoked Sausage
des: "I had some left over cabbage and ham hock and threw this together.  This is delicious served over cornbread. I was very surprised because it sounded yucky."
ins: In a large pot, combine the lima beans, ham hocks, water, cabbage and butter. Season with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and set a lid on top but leave a crack for steam. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours. Remove the lid, add the tomatoes and sausage; simmer with the lid on until beans are completely tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
